content:
As many of you know, we are moving forward with an STU Update (V1.1.0) that will fix a number of issues in the CARIN IG for Blue ButtonÂ® that have been identified since the STU1 publication in November 2020. On April 1 at 11 am ET, we will walk through all the changes that have been proposed and answer any questions that you might have related to the STU Update or the IG more broadly. We understand that not everyone is aware of the upcoming update, so we will be posting about this call on Confluence, but would also ask you to help us spread the word. We will hold a special session at the April CARIN virtual Connectathon as well to walk through the changes and answer questions. You can sign up for the Connectathon here.

Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/93144689862?pwd=SXJmWmJwN3pQL1NJa3UzaU40VExqQT09

Password: 106712
is there a recording of this meeting? Would seem highly inefficient if there wasn't one...

I am not sure that review was recorded, but a more recent one at the CARIN Connectathon last week was.
The event recordings are available on Confluence here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104568791
I believe the one regarding v1.1.0 is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/download/attachments/104568791/zoom_1.mp4?version=1&modificationDate=1618438069423&api=v2
